1-single: <p:none>\"The Jensen Paradox, third installment in the Jensen series.\"
3-single: <p:none>\"Surface Tension, the hotel nobody ever leaves.\"
4-single: <p:none>\"An endless maze of hallways, doors, swimming pools and libraries...\"
5-single: <p:none>\"Astrae Symphonia, a tale of intrigue, emotion, and music.\"
6-single: <p:none>\"Follow this rogue starship to the edge of the galaxy!\"
9-single: <p:player>(Type four batteries. Good for small devices and tools.)
12-single: <p:player>(A makeshift \"rope\" made from pieces of a blanket.)
13-single: <p:player>(A comfortable blanket. Haven't found something to cut it with yet.)
18-single: <p:none>(You realize you don't have a book to read in bed.)
19-single: <p:none>(You ponder what kind of book you'd like to read.)
20-single: <p:none>(You're realize you're in the mood for something novel.)
22-single: <p:none>(You realize you should probably go to bed now.)
24-single: <p:player>(I don't really know where I am.)
25-single: <p:player><f:sigh>(Going outside might give me a better idea.)
28-single: <p:player><f:confused>(How is it floating? Why is there nothing else out there?)
29-single: <p:player><f:side>(If I could find something to \"test\" this place...)
30-single: <p:player>(... it might give me a clue how to escape it.)
31-single: <p:player><f:sweat>(I'm looking for a way to escape.)
32-single: <p:player><f:sweat5>(To do that, I need to know what this place's limits are.)
33-single: <p:player><f:side>(I can't exactly risk walking off the edge myself, so...)
34-single: <p:player>(... maybe I could throw those rocks off instead.)
35-single: <p:player>(... maybe I could throw something else off instead.)
36-single: <p:player>(So far, I've cut this blanket and made it into a rope.)
37-single: <p:player><f:side>(Now, I just need something to hold it in place for the climb...)
38-single: <p:player>(... something strong and sturdy, like metal.)
39-single: <p:player>(So far, I've found a blanket, which I can make into a rope.)
40-single: <p:player><f:sigh>(I still need something to cut it with.)
41-single: <p:player><f:determined>(I need to find a way down to that platform.)
42-single: <p:player>(It's too far to jump, so I'll have to try something else.)
45-single: <p:player><f:sigh>(Strange as it is, something about this house is comfortable.)
46-single: <p:player><f:side>(In another life, I could see myself living here...)
48-single: <p:player>(There's nothing else for me to do here.)
51-single: This game features tons of cute characters and heartfelt moments, presented in a simple visual style.
52-single: If you're looking for violence, fancy graphics, or even a game over screen, you won't find any of those here.
56-single:
Press [] [] to select.
Press [Z] to confirm.
57-single:
Press [C] to toggle the menu.
{color=0x7f7f7f}Try every menu function.

346-single: <p:player><f:sigh>(No matter what happens, it'll always be a dining chair.)

348-single: <p:player><f:sigh>(... there's something weird about this dining chair.)
350-single: <p:none>(A leaky faucet. You'd like to fix this as soon as possible.)
351-single: <p:player><f:sweat5>(If this was MY house, I'd fix this on the spot.)
353-single: <p:none>(Jars with spices used in fancier meals. They're full to the brim.)
354-single: <p:player><f:sweat>(Never open a stranger's spice jars. Learned that the hard way.)
356-single: <p:none>(The only dinner plate you'll ever need.)
357-single: <p:player>(A dinner plate. Looks like it's part of a set.)
359-single: <p:none>(Kitchen utensils. You see no reason to replace them.)
362-single: <p:none>(Plates and bowls stacked neatly in a pile. You don't use these.)
364-single: <p:none>(The fridge. You'd eat something if it wasn't so late.)
365-single: <p:player><f:sweat4>(Hope they don't mind me eating their food...)
366-single: <p:none>(A laser-action stove and oven combination. It's very clean.)
368-single: <p:player><f:sodesuka>(Guess I'm not the only one who doesn't know how to cook.)
371-single: <p:none>(A length of rope. It's been useful over the years.)
372-single: <p:none>(A pair of scissors, good for cutting ropes.)
373-single: <p:none>(A well-stocked pantry. With this, you'll be ready for doomsday.)
376-single: <p:none>(You feel this is exactly where it belongs.)
378-single: <p:player><f:side>(Looks like an extension for that dining table...)
385-single: <p:player><f:side>(I swear there was a box like that in the living room somewhere...)
386-single: <p:player><f:confused>(Was there a lockbox around here somewhere?)
388-single: <p:player><f:sweat5>(... I've found the lockbox, but I can't reach it...)
389-single: <p:player><f:sodesuka>(... weird how a library card needed a locked box.)
